name: Keeping of cash book
text: §40-9  Keeping of cash book.  The director of finance shall keep in the director's office a cash book in which shall be entered up all sums received and paid out of the treasury on account of the several departments and bureaus of the State. [L 1898, c 39, §25; RL 1925, §1461; RL 1935, §587; RL 1945, §1591; RL 1955, §34-41; am L Sp 1959 2d, c 1, §14; am L 1963, c 114, §1; HRS §40-9; gen ch 1985]
